mysql: SELECT `books`.`id`, `books`.`authors_id`, `books`.`languages_id`, `books`.`title`, `books`.`year`, `books`.`created_at`, `books`.`updated_at`, `author`.`id` AS `author.id`, `author`.`name` AS `author.name`, `author`.`created_at` AS `author.created_at`, `author`.`updated_at` AS `author.updated_at` FROM `books` AS `books` LEFT OUTER JOIN `authors` AS `author` ON `books`.`authors_id` = `author`.`id` WHERE `books`.`id` = 1
postgresql: SELECT "books"."id", "books"."authors_id", "books"."languages_id", "books"."title", "books"."year", "books"."created_at", "books"."updated_at", "author"."id" AS "author.id", "author"."name" AS "author.name", "author"."created_at" AS "author.created_at", "author"."updated_at" AS "author.updated_at" FROM "books" AS "books" LEFT OUTER JOIN "authors" AS "author" ON "books"."authors_id" = "author"."id" WHERE "books"."id" = 1
